beer.name: Pipeline Porter
beer.description: Pipeline Porter is smooth and dark with a distinctive roasty aroma and earthy complexity from its diverse blends of premium malted barley. This celebration of malt unites with freshly roasted 100% Kona coffee grown at Cornwell Estate on Hawaii's Big Island, lending a unique roasted aroma and flavor. A delicate blend of hops rounds out this palate-pleasing brew.
beer.grains: pale, carapils, victory, caramel 80, extra special, chocolate malt, dark chocolate malt, roasted barley
